text: BBB may refer to: * Bear Behaving Badly, a British TV show starring Barney Harwood * Blood–brain barrier, a structure that protects the brain from chemicals in the blood * Bam Bam Bigelow (1961-2007), the ringname of professional wrestler Scott Bigelow * Blood Blockade Battlefront, a manga series written and illustrated by Yasuhiro Nightow ==Codes== * bbb, the ISO 639:b language code for Barai * BBB, a type of birdshot used in shotgun shells * BBB, BBB+, BBB−, investment grade Β bond credit ratings ==Organisations== * BBB, Better Business Bureau, a North American organization of businesses supporting consumer rights * Farmer–Citizen Movement (), a political party in the Netherlands
title: BBB
